citation_details.title: The time-course of feature-based attention effects dissociated from temporal expectation and target-related processes
citation_details.author: D Moerel, T Grootswagers, AK Robinson, SM Shatek
citation_details.abstract: Selective attention prioritises relevant information amongst competing sensory input. Time-resolved  electrophysiological studies have shown stronger representation of attended
citation_details.short_author: D Moerel, T Grootswagers, AK Robinson, SM Shatek
